Backup.name: Backup
Backup.description: Starts a backup job for an existing file system.

ClientMount.name: ClientMount
ClientMount.description: Permission for allowing read-access to a file system.

ClientRootAccess.name: ClientRootAccess
ClientRootAccess.description: Permission for allowing root-access to a file system.

ClientWrite.name: ClientWrite
ClientWrite.description: Permission for allowing write-access to a file system.

CreateAccessPoint.name: CreateAccessPoint
CreateAccessPoint.description: Creates an access point for the specified file system.

CreateFileSystem.name: CreateFileSystem
CreateFileSystem.description: Creates a new, empty file system.

CreateMountTarget.name: CreateMountTarget
CreateMountTarget.description: Creates a mount target for a file system.

CreateTags.name: CreateTags
CreateTags.description: Creates or overwrites tags associated with a file system.

DeleteFileSystem.name: DeleteFileSystem
DeleteFileSystem.description: Deletes a file system, permanently severing access to its contents.

DeleteFileSystemPolicy.name: DeleteFileSystemPolicy
DeleteFileSystemPolicy.description: Clears the resource-level policy for a given file system.

DeleteTags.name: DeleteTags
DeleteTags.description: Deletes the specified tags from a file system.

DescribeAccessPoints.name: DescribeAccessPoints
DescribeAccessPoints.description: Returns the descriptions of Amazon EFS access points.

DescribeBackupPolicy.name: DescribeBackupPolicy
DescribeBackupPolicy.description: Returns the current BackupPolicy object for the specified Amazon EFS file system.

DescribeFileSystemPolicy.name: DescribeFileSystemPolicy
DescribeFileSystemPolicy.description: Returns the current resource-level policy for a given file system.

DescribeFileSystems.name: DescribeFileSystems
DescribeFileSystems.description:
Returns the description of a specific Amazon EFS file system if either the file system
                                                CreationToken or the FileSystemId is provided; otherwise, returns descriptions of
                                                all file systems owned by the caller's AWS account in the AWS region of the endpoint
                                                that you're calling.

DescribeLifecycleConfiguration.name: DescribeLifecycleConfiguration
DescribeLifecycleConfiguration.description:
Returns the current LifecycleConfiguration object for the specified Amazon EFS file
                                                system.

DescribeMountTargetSecurityGroups.name: DescribeMountTargetSecurityGroups
DescribeMountTargetSecurityGroups.description: Returns the security groups currently in effect for a mount target.

DescribeMountTargets.name: DescribeMountTargets
DescribeMountTargets.description:
Returns the descriptions of all the current mount targets, or a specific mount target,
                                                for a file system.

DescribeTags.name: DescribeTags
DescribeTags.description: Returns the tags associated with a file system.

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.description: Returns the tags associated with the specified Amazon EFS resource.

ModifyMountTargetSecurityGroups.name: ModifyMountTargetSecurityGroups
ModifyMountTargetSecurityGroups.description: Modifies the set of security groups in effect for a mount target.

PutBackupPolicy.name: PutBackupPolicy
PutBackupPolicy.description: Enables automatic backups with AWS Backup by creating a new BackupPolicy object.

PutFileSystemPolicy.name: PutFileSystemPolicy
PutFileSystemPolicy.description:
Apply a resource-level policy granting and/or restricting actions from given actors
                                                for the specified file system.

PutLifecycleConfiguration.name: PutLifecycleConfiguration
PutLifecycleConfiguration.description: Enables lifecycle management by creating a new LifecycleConfiguration object.

Restore.name: Restore
Restore.description: Starts a restore job for an existing file system.

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.description: Creates or overwrites tags associated with the specified Amazon EFS resource.

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description: Deletes the specified tags from a specified Amazon EFS resource.

UpdateFileSystem.name: UpdateFileSystem
UpdateFileSystem.description:
Updates the throughput mode or the amount of provisioned throughput of an existing
                                                file system.
